desc: Ronald McDonald House New York provides temporary housing for pediatric cancer patients and their families in a strong, supportive and caring environment which encourages and nurtures the development of child-to-child and parent-to-parent support systems.

layout.text: Help Families Fighting Cancer in Hospitals and Homes in NYC
Deliver music, mindful meditation, and fun activities that help kids with cancer cope with being in the hospital.
Heroes On The Ave Block Party
